title: Back-End Development
items: Proficient in C#, ASP.NET Core, ASP.NET MVC, ASP.NET MVVM, Web API, and Entity Framework.
Experience with MongoDB, MySQL, PostgreSQL database setup and management.
Knowledge of SQL and database design principles.
Experience with MSAL for authentication and authorization.

title: Front-End Development
items: Experience with React, React Native, Next.js, and Mobile App Development.
Knowledge of JavaScript, TypeScript, HTML, CSS, Tailwind and Bootstrap.
Proficient in building responsive web applications.

title: Tools
items: Familiar with Visual Studio, WebStorm, Visual Studio Code, Github, Azure DevOps, Postman, and other development tools.
Experience with Swagger API for API documentation.
Proficient in using Docker for containerization.
Familiar with Tanstack for state management in front-end applications.
Experienced in using CI/CD pipelines for automated testing and deployment.

title: Applications
items: Worked with Blazor for building interactive web applications.
Experience with Next.js for server-side rendering and static site generation.
Familiar with NextUI for building modern, responsive UI components.
